strings.string: These options above set the default value for TRIM record searching. Spaces in variable names are not allowed. Variables are case sensitive, i.e. "name" is not the same as "NAME". Any variable added to this form becomes available in the "Data Mappings" section below. Default value is used if a data mapping has not been setup or produces no result. Variable names can only contain letters (A-Z,a-z), digits (0-9), underscore (_), dash (-) and dot (.)
